title: Last call for Expressions of Interest: Deputy Chief Scientific Advisor at the Home Office

content.text: Are you ready to take on a pivotal role in shaping the scientific landscape of the Home Office? This is your final opportunity to express your interest in the position of Deputy Chief Scientific Advisor.

As the Deputy Chief Scientific Advisor, you will support the Chief Scientific Advisor and be an integral part of the Senior Leadership Team within the Science, Technology, Analysis, and Research (STAR) Group.
This opportunity is open to candidates from across the Civil Service. For more information and to view the full job description, please visit the Civil Service jobs portal.
Please contact DGSTARandCSA@homeoffice.gov.uk if you have questions.
Don’t miss out on this chance to make a significant impact. Submit your expression of interest before the deadline.
